# GRIIS Baseline

- URL:
  - https://www.nature.com/articles/sdata2017202
- Accessed: 2026-02-08

## NBMS mapping
- `sync_griis_za` ingests baseline checklist rows for South Africa into `IASCountryChecklistRecord`.
- Derived national alien profile values are persisted in `AlienTaxonProfile`.
- Source-level provenance is retained through source dataset identifiers and retrieval metadata.
